item.title: South Korean financial group Mirae Asset has increased its Strategy position, with the current holdings valued at $153 million.
item.description: On August 27th, according to BitcoinTreasuries, the South Korean financial group Mirae Asset, which has a total Assets Under Management (AUM) of $61.4 billion, has raised its holdings in Strategy (MSTR) by 25%. Currently, it holds MSTR shares worth $153 million.

item.title: Over a hundred crypto companies have signed a joint letter requesting the inclusion of DeFi protection provisions in the cryptocurrency market structure bill.
item.description: On August 27th, as per cryptocurrency journalist Eleanor Terrett, more than 110 cryptocurrency companies, investors, and advocacy groups have signed a joint letter to caution the leaders of the U.S. Senate Banking and Agriculture Committee. They stated that they will be unable to support the market structure legislation unless it explicitly safeguards open-source software developers and non-custodial service providers. With the backing of heavyweight firms such as Coinbase, a16z crypto, Ripple, top projects, investment firms, and state blockchain committees, the DeFi Education Fund warned that labeling developers who release code or enable non-custodial blockchain access as financial intermediaries could impede U.S. blockchain innovation.The alliance pointed out that according to a recent White House report on digital assets, the proportion of U.S. open-source software developers has witnessed a significant decline, dropping from 25% in 2021 to 18% in 2025. While the alliance commend

item.title: Bybit launches BSU inverse perpetual contract, with up to 20x leverage
item.description: August 27th. Bybit has initiated the BSU U inverse perpetual contract featuring a leverage of up to 20 times.

item.title: U.S. Treasury Secretary: Does Not Believe Nvidia Needs Financial Support
item.description: On August 27th, U.S. Treasury Secretary Yellen said: (When asked if the U.S. government would invest in NVIDIA) I don't believe NVIDIA requires financial support. It appears that the possibility of the U.S. government investing in NVIDIA is "not being discussed." (FX168)

item.title: Federal Reserve Governor Powell to Sue Trump for Firing Him as Early as Today
item.description: On August 27th, as per CNBC, sources disclosed that a Federal Reserve Board member, Lisa Cook, is scheduled to file a lawsuit as early as today (in connection with Trump's dismissal).BlockBeats reported yesterday that U.S. President Trump signed a document removing the Federal Reserve Board member Cook from office with immediate effect. In the document, Trump stated: "By the authority vested in me by Article II of the U.S. Constitution and the amended 1913 Federal Reserve Act, I hereby dismiss Cook from the Board of the Federal Reserve System. Given Cook's lack of honesty in financial matters and potential engagement in criminal activities, I cannot have confidence in your integrity. At the very least, these actions demonstrate serious negligence in your financial transactions, raising doubts about your ability and credibility as a financial regulator."

item.title: Affected by Binance Spot Trading Listing, DOLO Surges Over 40% Short-term
item.description: On August 27th, based on market data, due to its listing on Binance Spot, DOLO witnessed a significant surge of over 40% in a short span. Currently, it is trading at $0.307, which represents a 14% increase from Binance's announcement.

item.title: Binance will list Dolomite (DOLO) Spot Trading
item.description: August 27th. According to official information, Binance is set to launch DOLO on August 28, 2025, at 0:00 (Beijing Time) and initiate trading pairs with USDT, USDC, BNB, FDUSD, and TRY. DOLO will be marked with a seed tag. Users will be able to commence depositing DOLO on August 27, 2025, at 12:30 (UTC).It is crucial to keep in mind that currently, users can trade DOLO on the Binance Alpha Market. Nevertheless, once spot trading is activated, DOLO will no longer be displayed on the Alpha Market, and its trading volume will not be factored into Alpha Points.

item.title: Binance HODLer Airdrop Launches Dolomite (DOLO)
item.description: August 27th. According to official channels, Binance announced the commencement of the 33rd HODLer airdrop project - Dolomite (DOLO). Users who subscribed to BNB from 00:00 on August 3, 2025 (UTC) up to 23:59 on August 6 (UTC) for Simple Earn (Flexible / Locked) and/or on-chain savings products will be eligible for the airdrop distribution. The HODLer airdrop details are anticipated to become visible within 24 hours, and the new token will be delivered to users' spot accounts at least 1 hour prior to the start of trading.

item.title: BTC and ETH Options with a notional value of $14.5 billion are set to expire this Friday, with BTC's max pain at $116,000 and ETH's max pain at $3,800.
item.description: On August 27th, based on Deribit data, at 4:00 PM Beijing time this Friday, the options expiration will occur. There are 102,000 BTC options expiring, with a Put Call Ratio of 0.79. The maximum pain is $116,000, and the notional value is $11.34 billion.For Ethereum options, the maximum pain is $3800. The notional value is $3.19 billion, and the put/call ratio is 0.76.

item.title: A whale address has once again withdrawn 274,000 LINK from Binance, with a total holding of 938,000 LINK.
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale address once more withdrew 274,528 LINK from Binance, which is worth $6.7 million. Currently, this whale address holds 938,108 LINK, with a value of $22.94 million.
